metadata.name: shielded_pool
metadata.description: Shielded pool for privacy-enhanced token transfers on Solana

instructions.name: deposit_v2
docs: Deposit tokens into the current epoch

accounts.name: depositor_token_account
docs: Depositor's token account - also serves as gate validation (must have non-zero balance)

accounts.name: epoch_tree
docs: Epoch tree to finalize (must be Frozen)

instructions.name: gc_epoch_tree
docs: Garbage collect an expired epoch tree

accounts.name: epoch_tree
docs: Epoch tree to close (must be expired)

instructions.name: gc_leaf_chunk
docs: Garbage collect an expired leaf chunk

instructions.name: gc_nullifier
docs: Garbage collect a single nullifier marker

instructions.name: gc_nullifier_batch
docs: Batch garbage collect multiple nullifier markers

accounts.name: collector
docs: Receives rent refund for all closed accounts

instructions.name: initialize_epoch_leaf_chunk
docs: Initialize a leaf chunk for storing commitments

instructions.name: initialize_pool_v2
docs: Initialize a new epoch-based shielded pool
burn_rate_bps: Burn rate in basis points (10 = 0.1%, max 1000 = 10%)

accounts.name: vault
docs: Token vault to hold deposited tokens

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that can pause pool and transfer authority

instructions.name: renew_note
docs: Renew a note by moving it to the current epoch

accounts.name: new_epoch_tree
docs: New epoch tree (must be Active - current epoch)

instructions.name: rollover_epoch
docs: Roll over to a new epoch

instructions.name: transfer_authority
docs: Transfer pool authority to a new address

accounts.name: spend_epoch_tree
docs: Epoch tree being spent from (must be Finalized)

accounts.name: deposit_epoch_tree
docs: Current active epoch tree for new commitments

instructions.name: withdraw_v2
docs: Withdraw tokens using a ZK proof

accounts.name: epoch_tree
docs: Epoch tree being spent from (must be Finalized)

accounts.name: nullifier_marker
docs: Nullifier marker PDA - will be created to mark nullifier as spent

accounts.name: recipient_token_account
docs: Recipient's token account - also serves as gate validation (must have non-zero balance after receive)

errors.name: EpochNotActive
errors.msg: Epoch is not active, cannot deposit

errors.name: EpochNotFrozen
errors.msg: Epoch is not frozen, cannot finalize

errors.name: EpochNotFinalized
errors.msg: Epoch is not finalized, cannot spend

errors.name: EpochNotExpired
errors.msg: Epoch has not expired yet, cannot garbage collect

errors.name: EpochNotReadyForRollover
errors.msg: Epoch is not ready for rollover

errors.name: EpochNotReadyForFinalization
errors.msg: Epoch is not ready for finalization

errors.name: InsufficientGateBalance
errors.msg: User must hold the pool token to transact

fields.name: count
docs: Number of leaves in this chunk

fields.name: start_slot
docs: Slot when this epoch started accepting deposits

fields.name: end_slot
docs: Slot when this epoch stopped accepting deposits (0 if active)

fields.name: finalized_slot
docs: Slot when this epoch was finalized (0 if not finalized)

fields.name: next_index
docs: Next leaf index (number of deposits in this epoch)

fields.name: frontier
docs: Current frontier nodes for incremental tree updates

fields.name: roots
docs: Ring buffer of historical roots (for proof validity window)

fields.name: roots_len
docs: Number of roots in ring buffer

fields.name: roots_head
docs: Current head position in ring buffer

fields.name: zero_hashes
docs: Precomputed zero hashes for empty subtrees

fields.name: version
docs: Schema version for upgrades (1 = legacy, 2 = epoch-based)

fields.name: vault_authority
docs: PDA authority over the token vault

fields.name: vault
docs: Token vault holding all deposited funds

fields.name: authority
docs: Authority that can pause/unpause and transfer authority

fields.name: expiry_slots
docs: Slots after epoch end before garbage collection allowed

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: Total deposits across all epochs (for stats)

fields.name: total_withdrawals
docs: Total withdrawals across all epochs (for stats)

fields.name: vault_authority_bump
docs: Bump seed for vault authority PDA

fields.name: config_bump
docs: Bump seed for this config PDA

fields.name: program_bump
docs: Legacy: Program bump (same as config_bump for v1)

fields.name: total_burned
docs: Total tokens burned across all transactions (for analytics)
